Name: Cucumber Martini
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: (Ideally, cut skin from cucumber log before chopping). MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker, add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Cucumber has never tasted so good, helped by being vodka-laced and infused with notes of bison grass. The touch of sugar in this cocktail helps amplify flavours rather than sweetening the cocktail.
History: There are many different Cucumber Martini recipes; this is mine - much improved in July 2023 thanks to a comment by Marco, a fellow Discerning Drinker (below).
